name: Artifact Avenger
description:
Game Description:

A number of groundbreaking discoveries reshaped the archeological world in the twentieth century with artefacts from all corners of the globe stolen for museums and private collections. Taking matters into her own hands, historian Inzel Santos has begun returning these artefacts to where they rightfully belong. Using your grappling whip, swing past guards, roaming cameras and traps to retrieve artefacts from a private collection to return to an Aztec temple in this vintage 2D adventure puzzle platformer.

Controller Binds (Recommended) :

  • Left Stick - Movement
  • Right Stick - Aim Whip
  • Left Bumper - Jump
  • Right Bumper - Swing Whip
  • Start - Menu

Keyboard Binds:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Space - Jump
  • Mouse - Aim Whip
  • Left Click - Swing Whip
  • ESC - Menu

Install Instructions:

  • Unzip File "Artifact Avenger.zip"
  • Run Executable "Artifact Avenger.exe"

Made By: Ciara Fitchet, James Henshall, Laurie Eaton, Mars Leodegrance, Michael Smith, Sam Russell
